methods.name: Boolean

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to be converted to a Boolean.

methods.description: Creates and returns a new Boolean object set to the value of the argument converted to a boolean.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Creates a string representation of this object that can be fed back to eval() to re-create an object. Works only with built-in classes.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns the string representation of the value of bool.
methods.longdesc: The method returns the string true if the primitive value of bool is true; otherwise it returns the string false.

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns the primitive value of bool.
methods.longdesc: The method returns true if the primitive value of bool is true; otherwise it returns false.
